title: Bathing and Drying
dis1: Thorough baths using pet-safe shampoos and conditioners.
dis2: Drying process tailored to each pet's coat type and sensitivity.
dis3: Keeps pets clean, healthy, and fresh.

title: Brushing and Detangling
dis1: Regular brushing to remove loose hair and prevent mats.
dis2: Special detangling techniques for pets with long or thick fur.
dis3: Helps maintain a smooth and healthy coat.
ProgramCovers: Coat maintenance through brushing and detangling.

title: Haircut and Styling
dis1: Customized haircuts based on breed standards or owner preferences.
dis2: Professional styling for a neat and polished appearance.
dis3: Ensures pets stay comfortable and stylish.

title: Nail Trimming and Filing
dis1: Careful trimming to maintain the right length for healthy paws.
dis2: Filing down sharp edges for smooth, safe nails.
dis3: Prevents discomfort and injury from overgrown nails.

title: Ear Cleaning
dis1: Gentle cleaning of ears to remove dirt and excess wax.
dis2: Prevents infections and promotes overall ear health.
dis3: Done with care to avoid discomfort.

title: Dental Care
dis1: Basic teeth cleaning to maintain optimal oral hygiene and prevent dental issues.
dis2: Freshens breath and helps prevent tartar buildup.
dis3: Gentle care to ensure pet comfort during the process.

title: Skin and Coat Conditioning
dis1: Nourishing treatments to keep the skin healthy and hydrated.
dis2: Promotes a shiny, soft coat and prevents dryness.
dis3: Perfect for pets with sensitive or dry skin.

title: Paw Pad Moisturizing
dis1: Gentle moisturizing treatments for cracked or dry paw pads.
dis2: Prevents discomfort from walking on rough surfaces.
dis3: Maintains soft, healthy paw pads for active pets.

title: Full Grooming Package
dis1: Comprehensive grooming session covering all pet grooming needs.
dis2: Includes bathing, drying, brushing, haircut, and nail trimming.
dis3: Keeps pets looking fresh and feeling their best.
ProgramCovers: Complete grooming from head to paw.
